annotations.description: It was a good decision to watch today's encounter. There has been more to see on the pitch than in most of the other games. Both teams tried unsuccessfully to control the game. Their overall performances were more or less even. The hosts displayed good teamplay with a lot of passes. The visiting side patiently waited in their own half to dispossess the opponent and hit them on the break.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows for the end of today's match.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Diego Costa makes way for Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea).

What a save from Thibaut Courtois! Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) jumps high to meet a cross and glances a promising header from close range, but the goalkeeper pulls off a brilliant stop to keep it out.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: There will be a minimum of 3 min. of added time.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Divock Origi (Liverpool) is coming onto the pitch as Adam Lallana cannot continue after picking up an injury.
Good team movement sets up Pedro (Chelsea) on the edge of the box, but he slices the ball narrowly wide of the right post.
The free kick is taken by Cesc Fabregas (Chelsea), but ball is cleared.
Dejan Lovren (Liverpool) commits an ugly challenge. The referee sees it and immediately blows his whistle. Chelsea will take a free kick near the side line.
Mark Clattenburg blows his whistle after Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Antonio Conte has decided to substitute Willian and he is replaced by Cesc Fabregas (Chelsea).

annotations.label: attendance

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Willian (Chelsea) is awarded a yellow card. The referee showed him no mercy.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Good work from Chelsea as they win a corner. Willian (Chelsea) takes the corner but it's cleared.

annotations.label: penalty-missed
annotations.description: Simon Mignolet anticipates the direction of the penalty by Diego Costa (Chelsea). He attempted to put the ball into the bottom left corner, but the goalkeeper was there in time to deny him.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) is heading towards the penalty spot to take it.

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: Mark Clattenburg blows his whistle for a foul after Joel Matip (Liverpool) hacks down one of his opponents. PENALTY! A huge scoring opportunity for Chelsea.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Jurgen Klopp has decided to make a change. Sadio Mane (Liverpool) replaces Philippe Coutinho.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) makes a bad challenge and the referee blows his whistle for a foul.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Today's match ends for Eden Hazard who will be replaced by Pedro (Chelsea).

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: The ball possession is 62:38.
One of the players from Liverpool times his run too early and the referee blows his whistle for offside.
Emre Can (Liverpool) announces himself with a close range shot after a cross, but one of the defenders gets in the way of the ball to thwart him.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) deprives his opponent of the ball, but the referee blows his whistle for a foul. He's not happy with the decision!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: James Milner (Liverpool) sees a yellow card from Mark Clattenburg after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) finds some space inside the box and scores with a crashing header low into the middle of the net, giving the goalkeeper no chance.
Victor Moses (Chelsea) is flagged for offside.
Victor Moses (Chelsea) takes a shot from inside the box and hits the right post!
Dejan Lovren (Liverpool) receives a pass and decides to smash the ball from long range, but his poor effort sails high over the bar.
Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) has a great chance to score from deep inside the box! He creates some space for the shot, but blazes it high over the crossbar. Very bad attempt.
Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) fouls an opponent. At least that's what referee Mark Clattenburg signals.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half has just started.

It wasn't the most inspiring 45 minutes that you'll see this week. Let's hope that the second period will be more exciting. It's difficult to say if one side enjoyed any superiority over the other in the first half. The home team makes a lot of passes and attempts to maintain possession, while the visitors look to counter attack.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The end of the first half.

annotations.label: y-card

James Milner (Liverpool) is adjudged to have been offside when making his run.
The linesman raises his flag as one of the players from Liverpool was in an offside position.

annotations.label: corner

Nathaniel Clyne (Liverpool) tries to send a pass but it's blocked. Liverpool have a corner.
Willian (Chelsea) tries his luck with a shot from 25 metres out, but his effort goes high over the bar.
Gary Cahill (Chelsea) should know this behaviour is beyond the rules. He was too careless with his challenge and left Mark Clattenburg no option but to blow his whistle.
David Luiz (Chelsea) is able to continue to play.

annotations.label: corner

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: David Luiz (Chelsea) is having a really tough time right now. We are about to find out how serious his injury is.
A fine lofted pass into the box, sent by Emre Can (Liverpool), is intercepted by the opposition's defence. The ball goes out of play and Liverpool have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Willian (Chelsea) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.

Simon Mignolet reacts well to deny a long range free kick from Willian (Chelsea) towards the right side of the goal. The ball goes behind for a corner. Chelsea will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) manages to dispossess his opponent of the ball, but he commits a foul in the process and the referee blows his whistle. Chelsea are given an advantage. They have a free kick.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: David Luiz (Chelsea) takes a free kick from 25 metres out. He surprises the goalkeeper and curls the ball in off the left post. What a strike that is!

Victor Moses (Chelsea) finds himself in a promising position after receiving a precise pass. He pulls the trigger but only hits one of the opposition, who gets in the way of his effort. Chelsea win a corner.

Adam Lallana (Liverpool) is penalised after knocking an opponent down.

Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) receives a pass and tries his luck with a shot from 23 metres out. Thibaut Courtois pulls off a decent save to stop the effort going into the right side of the goal.
Mark Clattenburg couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) and blew his whistle.

Adam Lallana (Liverpool) sends a beautiful cross into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence manages to clear the ball to safety. The referee points to the corner flag and Liverpool will take a corner.
